Package com.intellij.ui.scale

Class ScaleContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.scale.UserScaleContext
      • com.intellij.util.ui.JBUI.BaseScaleContext
        • com.intellij.ui.scale.ScaleContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JBUI.ScaleContext

    public class ScaleContext
extends JBUI.BaseScaleContext
    Extends UserScaleContext with the system scale, and is thus used for raster-based painting. The context is created via a context provider. If the provider is Component, the context's system scale can be updated via a call to update(), reflecting the current component's system scale (which may change as the component moves b/w devices).
    See Also:
    ScaleContextAware

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Updates the user scale with the current global user scale if necessary. Also updates the system scale (if the context was created from Component) if necessary.
        Overrides:
        update in class UserScaleContext
        Returns:
        whether any of the scale factors has been updated

      • setScale

        public boolean setScale(Scale scale)
        Sets the new scale (system scale is ignored). Use ScaleType.of(double) to provide the new scale. Note, the new scale value can be change on subsequent UserScaleContext.update(). Use UserScaleContext.overrideScale(Scale) to set a scale permanently. Also includes the system scale.
        Overrides:
        setScale in class UserScaleContext
        Parameters:
        scale - the new scale to set
        Returns:
        whether the new scale updated the current value
        See Also:
        ScaleType.of(double)
